tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: #FSI’s @HistoryatState held an open session of the Advisory Committee for Historical Diplomatic Documentation (#HAC). Guest…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #FSI’s @HistoryAtState held an open session of the Advisory Committee for Historical Diplomatic Documentation (#HAC). Guests discussed the Carter administration’s policy toward Africa, as documented in our Office of the Historian’s released #FRUS volume: bit.ly/3bDn1DF
